front.title: Provider Alias Numbers for Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) User Agent Configuration

abstract.t: This document defines procedures for how a SIP User Agent cantranslate an identifier provided by a user into the SIP DNS domainname of a service provider. The form of the user supplied identifieris constrained to values that can be entered using only a standard 12key telephone keypad.This document is derived from work begun in the SIP Forum TechnicalWorking Group User Agent Configuration Task Group.
